means.word_mean: 1. resembling air or having the form of air
2. characterized by lightness and insubstantiality; as impalpable or intangible as air;

sentences.sentence: "figures light and aeriform come unlooked for and melt away"- Thomas Carlyle

aeri空气,充气+form形状→空气的形状→无形的
